name: Touge Drift & Racing
description:
Touge Drift & Racing will take you to a beautiful foggy location with mountains, downhills, sharp turns and unique cars, which roar will make you feel a real satisfaction.

Your main aim is to drive a track for a minimal time interval with a maximal amount of drift points.

Each car has "drift" and "racing" stages, drift points depend on a maximal car speed and maximal drift angle: the higher speed, the bigger angle – this is a way to get more drift points.

- 3 Big Locations

- Mountain City

- Training Base

- 58 Configurations

- 10 Unique Cars

- Awesome Physics

- High Graphics

Join to the TD&R on Android!

Controls: W - Throttle; S - Brakes; A - Left; D - Right; Space - HandBrake; Shift - Gear Up; Control - Gear Down
